contributionDescription: I'm a crypto enthusiast and learn how to use the new crypto tools. I also invest heavily in growth of crypto by buying coins and participating in layer3, galxe and other campaigns. I and my partner are supporting Optimism by buying OP and planning to delegate it to voters on Tally.
impactDescription: I'm sharing about Optimism in my community on Telegram and with friends. A lot of them are investing heavily in Optimism and support delegation protocols. Also, I encourage them to share the word about Optimism through their influencer network. Hope that helps!
pwCategorySuggestions: Layer 2 Scaling, Delegation Protocols, Cryptocurrency Investing, Community Building, Influencer Marketing
